author: barnabasbusa
content: We are currently waiting for client teams to implement the devnet 6 spec. Depends on their timeline when that’s going to launch.

author: shishirhome
content: Thanks <@412614104222531604> meantime is there any way I can try out 4844? e.g i want is to compose KZG commitment, write that into blob, read it on chain and later read the blob data off-chain. I am using c-kzg library for now that it. Nothing beyond that?

author: barnabasbusa
content: You gonna have a hard time finding a working client right now tbh. Some clients are still on pre devnet 5 designs where it was rlp instead of ssz, then some are on devnet 5 design where we used some ssz, and now devnet 6 is going back to using rlp again. So I would hold off for about a week or so, when we have client releases, that’s when I will also be able to spin a new devnet up.

author: shishirhome
content: Thanks <@412614104222531604> for the info. i will stay tune..
